title: chrisEvan2
author: chrisEvan2
created_time: May 21, 2022, 01:30:33 AMLast edit: May 21, 2022, 01:42:59 AM by chrisEvan2
content: Missed Bitcoin, Dogecoin or Chia? Do not miss Cryptodoge!Cryptodoge is an open source peer-to-peer green digital currency, created by shiba community,favored by Shiba Inus worldwide.It is very hot now！【Offical links】Github：https://github.com/CryptoDoge-Network/cryptodogeOffical web://cryptodoge.cc/Gamefi：https://gamefi.cryptodoge.cc/Faucet：https://faucet.cryptodoge.cc/DISCORD：https://discord.com/invite/qK2x5zFUNxTwitter:https://twitter.com/cryptodoge_coinExplorer：https://alltheblocks.net/cryptodogeReply to this post, the XCD address you left, you will get 10,000 XCD airdrops, join the DISCORD group to participate in more game activities.A bitcointalk account can only claim once【Install wallet】The latest version of Cryptodoge wallet is 1.3.4, The method of using Cryptodoge wallet is as easy as Chia’s. You can plot file before sync,but you have to sync with the blockchain before transfer For your convenience,you could directly farm Cryptodoge with Chia's plot file rather than a second plot.If you don't need to mine, you can download the light wallet directly.full wallet github download：https://github.com/CryptoDoge-Network/cryptodoge/releases/tag/1.3.4light wallet github download：https://github.com/CryptoDoge-Network/cryptodoge-light-wallet/releases/tag/1.3.4After downloading, install wallet and create an account. Memorize mnemonics and secret keys, do not let anyone know your mnemonics and keys. Wait for syncing blocks form chain, if the speed of synchronization is slow, you can add these node to speed full node ip: 137.220.244.3 port: 15994full node ip: 216.83.58.68 port: 15994full node ip: 37.229.68.91 port: 15994full node ip: 5.13.8.136 port: 15994full node ip: 81.39.51.251 port: 15994【Start CRYPTODOGE】Cryptodoge farming is same with Chia farming, so you could refer to Chia's plotting and farm. you could plot and farm Cryptodoge with your own computer. There is not a high standard of equipments in Cryptodoge farming, but in order to farming fast, we suggest that the computer should have SSD, high capacity hard disk and good CPU.【Gamefi】CryptoDoge's gamefi-MetaDoge has been launched now, it is a blockchain gamefi and multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG), classic reproduction, millions of players gather, equipment depends on explosion, explosion rate is upgraded, blood PK, The best equipments are all minted into NFT on the chain, open and transparent throughout blockchain, and the economic system uses Cryptodoge cryptocurrency as an ecological token, which truly realizes the internal and external circulation of the economy. It's not only fun to play, but also earn it, what are you waiting for, let's play together！https://cryptodoge.cc/assets/img/bg1.jpghttps://cryptodoge.cc/assets/img/bg2.jpghttps://cryptodoge.cc/assets/img/bg4.jpg【Get Cryptodoge】1.How to get some Cryptodogecoin?You can get tipped Cryptodoge by participating in ,community will have a lot of activities(eg:air drop,community missions) on social mediaYou could “farm” on your computer with the way same as Chia farming: plotting file on your disk, syncing the network, and keeping online, then you will have chance to get cryptodoge coins.  You could “farm” on your computer with the way same as Chia farming: plotting file on your disk, syncing the network, and keeping online, then you will have chance to get cryptodoge coins. You can mine Cryptodoge while playing GameFi: Play games, PK opponents, build guilds, and kill monsters to get Cryptodoge. You can get some free Cryptodoge from the faucet.2.What exchanges will Cryptodoge be listed?Cryptodoge community will strive for list on exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, KuCoin, Kraken, Gateio, OKEx, Huobi and so on. Meanwhile, Cryptodoge will also go on-line on Uniswap and Pancakeswap for higher liquidity.3.How about the halving timeline of Cryptodoge?The total amount of cryptodoge is a constant, almost 200,000,000,000.halving every 3 years:0~3 year 20,000 XCD/block3~6 year 10,000 XCD/block6~9 year 5,000 XCD/block9~12 year 2500 XCD/block12~15 year 1250 XCD/block15~18 year 625 XCD/block18~21 year 312.5 XCD/block21~24 year 156.25 XCD/block24~27 year 78.125 XCD/block27~30 year 39.062 XCD/block30~99 year 50 XCD/block>99 year 0 XCD/blockReply to this post, the XCD address you left, you will get 10,000 XCD airdrops, join the DISCORD group to participate in more game activities.A bitcointalk account can only claim once

comments.author: massage
comments.body: Any forms? Wanna leave my address

comments.author: chrisEvan2
comments.body: Quote from: unnamed0simple on May 21, 2022, 02:45:35 AMGiveaway threads are not allowed  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=780979.0It is too old rule at 2014,now is 2022 now. And my bitcointalk account in 2013 can't be used now. Is this rule still in effect? I think airddrop is a good interaction,Aren't we here to get some altcoins, to tap new investment opportunities?

comments.author: unnamed0simple
comments.body: Quote from: chrisEvan2 on May 21, 2022, 06:17:04 AMQuote from: unnamed0simple on May 21, 2022, 02:45:35 AMGiveaway threads are not allowed  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=780979.0It is too old rule at 2014,now is 2022 now. And my bitcointalk account in 2013 can't be used now. Is this rule still in effect? I think airddrop is a good interaction,Aren't we here to get some altcoins, to tap new investment opportunities?The following are responses to your questions.Quote from: mprep on June 09, 2021, 07:30:06 PMQuote from: hackbyte on June 09, 2021, 12:34:37 PMQuote from: theymos on January 27, 2014, 06:11:50 AMMost giveaway threads are no longer allowed in the Alternate cryptocurrencies sections. From now on, posting or replying to such threads could result in being banned. Existing threads will be locked.Specifically, you are not allowed to give people any incentive to post insubstantial posts in your threads. You can't offer to pay people who post their addresses, usernames, etc. You can do giveaways off-site and link to the giveaway page in a thread, but you can't give people any bonus for replying to your thread.[.....]Heya, i wanna do a private airdrop for a asset on the stellar chain. My only goal is to get more people creating a trustline to that specific asset and then answer with their federation or wallet address so i can send them their token.Is that still ok over here? Regards,hackySeems like your giveaway incentivizes posting within one or more specific threads ("answer with their federation or wallet address") in exchange for altcoins ("a asset on the stellar chain"). So no, it's not allowed. You're free to post an announcement for your giveaway in Bounties (Altcoins) but accept entries via Bitcointalk PM (either ask users to PM you or PM a user specifically created for the airdrop). You can also accept entries off-site (e.g. via Google Forms).
